Key.Original: Asaayu's Stringtable Viewer
Key.English: Asaayu's Stringtable Viewer

Key.Original: Localization Key
Key.English: Localization Key

Key.Original: Localized Text
Key.English: Localized Text

Key.Original: Search (Enter)
Key.English: Search (Enter)

Key.Original: Copy Selected Key to Clipboard (Ctrl - C)
Key.English: Copy Selected Key to Clipboard (Ctrl - C)
Key.German: Ausgewählen Schlüssel in die Zwischenablage kopieren (STRG - C)

Key.Original: Export Selected Key Localize Code to Clipboard (Ctrl - X)
Key.English: Export Selected Key Localize Code to Clipboard (Ctrl - X)
Key.German: Ausgewählten Schlüssel als Übersetzungscode in die Zwischenablage kopieren (STRG - X)

Key.Original: Stringtable Origin
Key.English: Stringtable Origin

Key.Original: Language
Key.English: Language

Key.Original: View Stringtable.xml BIKI Page
Key.English: View Stringtable.xml BIKI Page

Key.Original: Contribute to the project on GitHub
Key.English: Contribute to the project on GitHub

Key.Original: !!! Stringtable Viewer - It took %3 seconds to load %4 %1 keys in %2 language !!!
Key.English: !!! Stringtable Viewer - It took %3 seconds to load %4 %1 keys in %2 language !!!
Key.German: !!! Stringtable Viewer - Es hat %3 Sekunden gedauert, um %4 %1 Schlüssel in %2 Sprachen zu laden !!!

Key.Original: !!! Stringtable Viewer - It took %1 seconds to preload stringtable list !!!
Key.English: !!! Stringtable Viewer - It took %1 seconds to preload stringtable list !!!
Key.German: !!! Stringtable Viewer - Das Vorladen der Stringtableliste hat %1 Sekunden gedauert. !!!

Key.Original: Loading
Key.English: Loading

Key.Original: Preloading Stringtables - Please Wait
Key.English: Preloading Stringtables - Please Wait

Key.Original: String to search for in both keys and localized text. (Case Insensitive)
Key.English: String to search for in both keys and localized text. (Case Insensitive)
Key.German: Zeichenkette nachder Schlüssel und die Übersetzungen durchsucht werden. (Groß- und Kleinschreibung wird nicht berücksichtigt)

Key.Original: Key used with the 'localize' command to return localized text.
Key.English: Key used with the 'localize' command to return localized text.
Key.German: Schlüssel der mit dem 'localize' Befehl verwendet wird.

Key.Original: Text returned when the key is localized.
Key.English: Text returned when the key is localized.
Key.German: Text der zurückgegeben wird, wenn der Schlüssel übersetzt wurde.

Key.Original: Custom stringtable.xml file paths (separated by ,)
Key.English: Custom stringtable.xml file paths (separated by ,)

Key.Original: Unable to modify custom stringtable.xml paths
Key.English: Unable to modify custom stringtable.xml paths
Key.German: Ändern der benutzerdefinierten stringtable.xml Pfade nicht möglich

Key.Original: You are missing the following dependency: User Input Menus
Key.English: You are missing the following dependency: User Input Menus
Key.German: Folgende Abhängigkeiten fehlen: User Input Menus
